::Savanna::

She heard the words come over her link. She thought this bot's answer 
was strange. "My home is here now. How can I be of assistance to you?"
She was wondering who this bot was. She was using her istincts on 
this one.  Something told her that this bot may be on her side.  Yet 
again, she was wary. She kept her claws sheathed, but kept them ready 
incase.  She lived by her instincts and relied on them.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia saw the Maximal coming into view, "My name is Phobia , I'm a 
> traveller a long way from hame who wishes to still have a home to 
> return to."
> 
> He was careful not to devulge any information to her if he didn't 
> have to, but the circumstances dictated that he be honest with his 
> new associates, but the side he was on dictated that he only 
answered 
> questions that they aked. and not volenteer any information.
> 
> (Gotta go, I'll reply tomorrow.)
>
